document_data.name: ''Potion of Freedom''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Potions of freedom''''', or '''''elixirs of guileful movement''''', were a type of [[potion]] that promised the imbiber freedom of movement.
document_data.Description: This potion was a strange and unnatural liquid that had a viscous texture of half-frozen [[honey]], yet it flowed as smoothly as [[mercury]].
document_data.Powers: This potion provided protection against all forms of paralysis. It was also effective against magical effects such as ''[[hold person]]'' and ''[[hold monster]]''.
document_data.Creation: An ''elixir of guileful movement'' could be created by a skilled [[alchemist]] through combining of alchemical suspension of [[ochre jelly]] and certain types of sublimates.
